item.title: [COLOR orange]Activacion de Hercules[/COLOR] [COLOR white] Necesitas ayuda? Te ayudamos. [/COLOR]

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() tutoriales = dialog.select('Elige un tutorial:', ['Activacion de licencia Hercules: Kodiadictos.', 'Tutorial de Hercules - Canal Nereo.', 'Tutorial de QUASAR','Kodiadictos: Quasar tutorial','Kodiadictos:Hercules.','Notbuffering tutorial']) channels = ['plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?video_id=TkjiSM68zE4', 'https://archive.org/download/HerculesCANALNEREO/Hercules-CANALNEREO.mp4', 'https://archive.org/download/tutorial_201710/tutorial.mp4', 'plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?video_id=fekNhnMMuh8', 'https://archive.org/download/hercules-kodiadictpos/hercules-kodiadictpos.mp4','https://archive.org/download/NetaiAvancedConfigSettings/Netai-avanced-config-settings.mp4'] return channels[tutoriales]

regex.name: getinput
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import xbmcgui,xbmc, xbmcaddon, time, base64
def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,txt='clave de acceso:'): addon = xbmcaddon.Addon('plugin.video.Hercules') addon_version = addon.getAddonInfo('version') profile = xbmc.translatePath(addon.getAddonInfo('profile').decode('utf-8'))
solver = InputWindow( txt=txt) solution = solver.get() if solution =='MTIzNDU='.decode('base64'): return play() else: return ''
class InputWindow(xbmcgui.WindowDialog): def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
self.txt = kwargs.get('txt','')
xbmcgui.WindowXMLDialog.__init__(self) #self.addControl(self.txt) path = xbmcaddon.Addon().getAddonInfo('path') self.kbd = xbmc.Keyboard() self.kbd.setHeading( self.txt)
def get(self): self.show() time.sleep(2) self.kbd.doModal() if (self.kbd.isConfirmed()): text = self.kbd.getText() self.close() return text self.close() return False
def play(): return 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Andorth/hercules/master/deportes/premium.xml'

regex.name: openDialog
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): __addon__ = xbmcaddon.Addon() __addonname__ = __addon__.getAddonInfo('name') line1 = "Grupo Netai:" line2 = "Equipo de desarrollo: DiseÃ±o, creacion y produccion: Netai" line3 = "Regex por Adryan, Seguridad y soporte de Catoal." xbmcgui.Dialog().ok(__addonname__, line1, line2, line3)
